hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\purple{7-6}&\purple{=2}\\
\purple{1}&\purple{=2}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $1$ is not the same as $2$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{2+3}&\pink{=6}\\
\pink{5}&\pink{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $6$.

$\begin{align}
\blue{10+3}&\blue{=13}\\
\blue{13}&\blue{=13}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $13$ is the same as $13$.
